outcome: Branch B: 'Echoes of the Oversight Room' - Emergency speakers broadcast a cryptic loop in Halden’s voice referencing hidden access codes. The city launches a collective hunt for emotional triggers, fracturing along lines of trust and deepening BCI instability.

events.description: Emergency speakers across Stenograd broadcast a distorted recording in Halden's voice, referencing 'reverse indices' and 'emotional triggers.' Citizens gather to decode the message.
Listening parties spring up around speakers, spawning social rituals and fiercely competing interpretations of Halden’s cryptic instructions. Directorate denounces gatherings as a threat to order.
Petrak and Daria pool memory fragments, tracing clues in the broadcast to locations altered during earlier BCI shaft installations, suspecting a fallback protocol hidden in city infrastructure.
Crowds move through city squares performing collective acts—shared silence, laughter, displays of loss—believing these may unlock system resets or access. BCI patterns shift erratically.

Factions split between those longing for Halden’s guidance and those fearing manipulation. Political debate fixates on whether the BCI should remain emotionally responsive or revert to stricter models.
